# nameComponents

**Instance Property**

The individual components of the person’s full name.

## Declaration

```swift
var nameComponents: PersonNameComponents? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains the name components specified at initialization time. Use the information in this property or the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPerson/displayName] property to identify the name of the user.

## Accessing the name

- **displayName**: The person’s formatted name.
